import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' function Login() { const [data,setdata] = useState({ name:"", age:"", city:"", pincode:"", district:"", contact:"", email:"", password:"", gender:"" }) const changefn = (e)=>{ setdata({...data,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const subfn = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() axios.post("http://localhost:4000/registerCustomer", data) .then((res)=>{console.log(res, "res");}) .catch((err)=>{console.log(err, "err");}) } return (

Registration Form

); } export default Login;
